data.content:
noun
plural ~ -tors
[count] mathematics :a number that can be divided by each of the denominators of a group of fractions
36 is a common denominator of {frac1/4} and {frac1/3}.
something (such as a feature or quality) that is shared by all the members of a group of people or things
Drugs seem to be the common denominator in these crimes. - see also lowest common denominator

(toán) mẫu số chung
tính chất chung, điểm chung
there is one common denominator in these very different schemes, namely that they are all aimed at reducing pollution
có một điểm chung giữa các kế họach khác nhau đó, chúng đều nhằm làm giảm ô nhiễm
